page.title: 19Housing in Maylands
page.content: Housing in Maylandsea was nearly all wooden chalet weekend accommodation or caravan plots. These have now nearly all changed to{permanent brick and {tile residences}with the majority detached and of an executive type. There are also a fair proportion of bungalows. The houses have been built by smaller building companies and self build groups.{The latest properties are timber framed of Scandinavian design with brick exterior. In Mayland the{Mid Essex housing association in conjunction with The Housing Corporation are building 40 flats for the{elderly with resident warden and communal facilities. The only council housing in the whole area is 6 cottages in Mayland.
